Resources

A buncha resources for website making and other stuff!

Inspiration

Having a hard time on what your website even looks like? These should provide plenty of it

  • Happy Hues, easy color inspo - link
  • Siteofsites, made for this very purpose! - link
  • Blue Pages, links to many other websites - link
  • Web Design Museum, what it says on the tin - link
  • Ytoo.org, a portal to various retro related sites - link
  • Starsubculture, other people showcasing their websites - link
  • Restorivland, a look at old geocities websites and the like - link

Tutorials

A bunch of things that help you do website stuff

  • W3schools - link
  • PetraPixel - link
  • Neoskitties - link
  • Sadgrl Archive - link
  • Flexbox Froggy - link
  • Solaria's Guides - link
  • Let's Learn Eleventy - link

Tools

Stuff to help with coding, I used most of the tools here

  • Sublime Text, my main code editor - link
  • Sadgrl's layout builder, not maintained - link
  • Webring tool list, what it says on the tin - link
  • Eleventy, the SSG that I'm using right now! - link
  • Petrapixel's layout builder, actively maintained - link
  • CSSgradient, what I used to make all of the gradients here - link

Visuals

Colors, ASCII as well as some other stuff

  • Phosphoricons, FOSS icon pack - link
  • BitFontMaker, Make your own pixel fonts - link
  • File Garden, file hosts with direct link - link
  • Dithermark, pretty good at dithering things - link
  • Ascii archive, categorized by the ASCII's theme - link
  • Squoosh, used to compress or convert image files - link
  • Ezgif, not just gifs! It can be other stuff as well - link
  • Button Maker, idk what else to tell you, it's a button maker - link
  • DaFont, free fonts that can be used for a variety of reasons - link
  • Patternico, background maker, I used this a few times in the past - link

Add-Ons

Stuff you can put on your website

  • Zonelets, blogging engine - link
  • Chattable, have a chatbox - link
  • Bloggable, iframe blogging tool - link
  • Incremental Button, make number go up - link
  • BaguetteBox, the lightbox gallery I use- link
  • HTML Journal, blogging tool for your website - link
  • Ayano's Comment Widget, used on the guestbook - link
  • Scripted, a variety of code snippets for your website - link

Faux Ad Services

Ad services that advertise other indie sites, somewhat an extension of the last category

  • Navlink - link
  • Artlink - link
  • Sidelink - link
  • Nekolink - link
  • Ringlink - link
  • Translink- link
  • Johnvertising - link

Webhosts

I haven't used most of these myself, but I've heard some good things. Maybe in the future I'll add a pros and cons list for these things

  • Blahaj.Land - link
